snippet: The Philharmonia Quartett Berlin gave a committed performance of the String Quartet by Witold Lutoslawski, a composer in the Polish avant-garde.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by Philharmonia Quartett Berlin at Weill Recital Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Philharmonia Quartett Berlin gave a committed performance of the String Quartet by Witold Lutoslawski, a composer in the Polish avant-garde.

headline.seo: Philharmonia Quartett Berlin at Weill Recital Hall
headline.main: Eerie Harmonics and Timbres Evoking a Swarm of Bees
headline.print_headline: Eerie Harmonics and Timbres Evoking a Swarm of Bees
